ygData.subject: Re: Pixie Strike  (Was: RE: Kelin`s Lucid Lullaby, how ot use?)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... To clarify:  Target the mob (that should still be Struck from last round), start up Strike, then immediately move for a better angle at the next mob.
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 15 Sep 1999 kim@... wrote:
>
> expire to further position them for easier targeting. And
> don't be afraid to turn or move to get a better targeting
> angle. You don't have to be facing your target to Strike
> them, and the "glaze" or resist message still shows up on

To clarify: Target the mob (that should still be Struck from
last round), start up Strike, then immediately move for a
better angle at the next mob. Don't wait for the "glaze" or
resist message before moving. If it's resisted, simply Strike
it again. If it takes, target the next mob (who is now right
in front of you) and repeat the process.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
